definition: to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: Associating etiquette habit education is an important part of the foundation education.
sentences.chinese: 交往礼仪养成教育是基础教育的重要内容。

sentences.english: A basic education of the Ministry of Education deputy director Wang Ding-hua said.
sentences.chinese: 教育部基础教育一司副司长王定华说。

sentences.english: All funds raised will be donated to Sowers Action to support the Foundation Education Development Program in China.
sentences.chinese: 所筹得捐款将全数作为支持发展中国基础教育之用。

sentences.english: Part three is an analysis of the teachers' role and behavior.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分，基础教育新课程改革中教师角色行为分析。

sentences.english: Socialization of children is an important subject in research of childrens education.
sentences.chinese: 儿童社会化是基础教育研究中的一个重要课题。

sentences.english: Traditional private school was a main type of non-governmental basic education in Chinese traditional society.
sentences.chinese: 私塾是中国传统社会中民间基础教育的一种主要形式。

sentences.english: From then on Mongolian and Tibetan Affairs opened a school of national basic education course.
sentences.chinese: 从此开启了蒙藏学校民族基础教育的历程。

sentences.english: In our country's basic education, the problem is clear that the competence of passing the examinations has been emphasized.
sentences.chinese: 我国基础教育对应试的过分强调使教育的弊端渐现。

sentences.english: In current China, the new curriculum reform of elementary education is carrying on imposingly.
sentences.chinese: 当前，我国基础教育新课程改革正在轰轰烈烈地进行。

sentences.english: First of all, summarizes the shenmu county's experience which is the process of education supply.
sentences.chinese: 首先，总结出神木县基础教育供给过程中的宝贵经验。

sentences.english: Transport Theory has had profound impact on various lays of ele-mentaryeducation with its development.
sentences.chinese: 迁移理论发展至今，已深刻影响基础教育的各个层面。

sentences.english: The drainage of teachers brings serious effects to the basic education.
sentences.chinese: 教师流失对该县基础教育造成了严重后果。

sentences.english: Our country is deeping reform of basic education in the new century.
sentences.chinese: 新世纪，我国基础教育改革正在深入进行。

sentences.english: The second Chapter is Hotan Development of Basic Education in Minority Areas.
sentences.chinese: 第二章为和田少数民族地区基础教育发展现状。

sentences.english: It's a breakthrough point of reformation for deepening our basic education that founding a feature school.
sentences.chinese: 创建特色学校是深化我国基础教育改革的一个突破点。

sentences.english: Headmasters take the lead in the fundamental education.
sentences.chinese: 中小学校长是基础教育的领头雁。

definition: all-round education (contrasted with 應試教育|应试教育[ying4 shi4 jiao4 yu4], exam-oriented education)
